description: Try our easy to follow Apple & Almond Tart recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Apple & Almond Tart Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 red-skinned dessert apples, cored and thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Unroll the puff pastry and place on a baking sheet. Sprinkle the grated marzipan evenly over, then arrange the apple slices in rows over the top.
Brush the apricot jam over the apple slices and sprinkle with the flaked almonds. Bake in a preheated oven, 200°C for 20 minutes until the pastry is golden and cooked.
Cut into squares and serve warm with cream or ice cream.
